name: campaign-manager
description: A campaign manager app built using Metal.js

scripts.build: browserify -d -e src/js/Main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ metal-jsx es2015] ] -s Main -o build/bundle.js
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run server
scripts.watch: watchify -d -e src/js/Main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ metal-jsx es2015 ] ] -s Main -o build/bundle.js
